wikipedia_page.main: Herbert Neesam (2 June 1892 – 6 July 1969) was an English professional footballer who played as a right half, making 281 appearances in the Football League for Bristol City in the years before and after the First World War.

response: Torrance played alongside Bert Neesam and had a benefit match v Gillingham on 15 January 1927 in which Tot Walsh scored 6 goals in a 9–4 win although Torrance himself did not play. Torrance joined Bath City in July 1928. Sandy Torrance died on 14 April 1941 after injury in an air raid on Bedminster on 11 April 1941.
